modName: Lasko pivo - Lasko beer - mead replacement
summary: Replaces Skyrim\'s mead model with Slovenian beer Lasko
descriptionHtml:
README: 

A simple mod which replaces Skyrim\'s Mead with Slovenian beer Lasko.

1.) Installation: Copy the \"Data\" folder to your Skyrim folder, choose replace if prompted.

NOTE: This will replace any other Mead replacement mods.

2.) Removal: Simply delete the file \"mead01.nif\" located in \"Skyrim/Data/meshes/clutter/ingredients\" and \"lasko_d.dds\", \"lasko_n.dds\" in \"Skyrim/Data/meshes/clutter/custom\".

NOTE: The model is way too high poly for prop and may cause slowdowns if too many are on screen at once. I just didn\'t have the time to optimize it, sorry.

Ver. 0.9
author: Okacat
